summary: Imagine this: You’re driving down the road when a Very Good Idea springs to mind.  You need to capture it quickly without fumbling through screens or struggling with Siri, which often requires internet access and can be hit-or-miss.  What you need is a seamless solution that promptly activates a voice recording, saves your thoughts, and sends them to your preferred app without any fuss...
title: ‘Dictate a Note’ is my new favorite shortcut (and that’s saying something)
